name: Self-Navigating Artificial Intelligence
description:
A machine learning project utilising a genetic algorithm for self navigating AI.

This is the project file as well as some instructions to help with changing settings.

The eventual goal of this project is to create an AI that can move not just on a track, but independantly such that it can back track through a maze and eventually find a player.

Please make sure that you are using Unity 2019.2.17f1
